results.title: Give sharks a chance
results.creator_credit: Orana Films, John Gau Productions, National Geographic Society and Richard Dennison
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Blue wilderness”.
After a series of shark attacks on the Gold Coast, Ron and Valerie Taylor, try to curb an outbreak of hysteria, and take a group of people, including two shark attack victims, to confront the object of their fears face to face.

results.title: Give me your soul
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Paul Cowan and Adam Symansky
results.brief_description: Give me your soul is a compelling documentary that explores the ins and outs of the porn industry in California. The documentary focuses on five main characters whose lives are entwined through porn. Luke Ford is a Jewish reporter who reports the goings on in the industry full-time, including disclosing which actors have contracted the HIV virus. Bill Margold, an ex-porn actor is a chaperone for new women wanting to get into porn. His latest debutant, Katie June, arrives from Tennessee determined to make it as a porn star with the blessing of her mother. The stories of Kimberly Jade and JD Ram are the real life tragedies that can strike some of those who enter the world of porn. This documentary is a fascinating and often disturbing look at the porn industry. It attempts to present a real life picture of how the industry operates, and the kinds of people who work within it.

results.title: Give him air
results.creator_credit: Stewart Hardy Films and John Sharpies
results.brief_description: Asphyxia and the term “getting one’s air” are explained. Various situations in which a casualty may die for lack of air are discussed. These are: poisonous atmosphere, blocked air passage, coma, crushed chest, and stab wound. The life saving actions to be taken are explained in detail and the unpleasant aspects of the injuries leading to asphyxia are not concealed. Winner of various film competition prizes.

results.title: Give & take = Give and take
results.brief_description: Consumer and Corporate Affairs Canada is a federal government agency concerned with protecting the interests of the consumer in today’s complex and highly competitive marketplace. Whatever is sold commercially —eggs, home furnishings, construction helmets, heating and cooking fuels — comes under its scrutiny. This film describes the whole range of checks and investigations carried out by the Department.

results.title: Giv'em a half turn
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Jerry Krepakevich and Reevan Dolgoy
results.brief_description: Russ Yuristy, the funky sculptor from Silton, Saskatchewan, has just finished a wooden buffalo commissioned by the city councillors of Swift Current. This film is about Yuristy’s three-ton buffalo, its 240-kilometer trip from studio to park, and the comments of the bystanders who react to the buffalo’s unusual looks. This light-hearted film shows one of the Prairies’ most unusual artists.

results.title: Gisser job (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “All in the Mind Series”.
Psychological studies of people at work. Considers ways in which stress associated with unemployment and among working people may be reduced.

results.title: Giselle
results.creator_credit: Associated Television, Stanley Dorfman and Rudolf Nureyev
results.brief_description: This made for television production of the classical ballet Giselle about love and betrayal stars Rudolf Nureyev as Count Albrect and Lynn Seymour as Giselle, with Monica Mason (Myrtha), Youri Vamos (Hilarion) and members of The Ballet of the Bavarian State Opera House. Original choreography by Jules Perrot and Jean Coralli, music by Adolphe Adam performed by The New World Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted and directed by David Coleman.

results.title: Giselle
results.brief_description: This production of the classic ballet, “Giselle” features the American Ballet Theatre and the Orchestra Der Deutschen Oper Berlin, conducted by John Lanchbery. Presented in two acts, choreography is by David Blair, Jules Perrot and Jean Coralli.
